text: Bruno Guimarães Rodriguez Moura (born 16 November 1997) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for club Newcastle United and the Brazil national team. He has been married to Ana Lídia Martins Guimarães since 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bruno Guimarães Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Association football midfielders Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:Olympic gold medalists for Brazil Category:Newcastle United F.C. players
title: Bruno Guimarães
